title: 13: Mr. and Mrs. Sloot
description:
TRIGGER WARNING: This episode may contain sensitive subjects to some listeners. 
To kickstart 2021 Sofia is joined by the infamous GHOSTWRITER aka Milfhunter. Together the two discuss some of their most personal moments that shaped who they are today, a VERY important Sloot University class, and Ghostwriter even tells a Slooty story that can help you make some extra money during the pandemic. Your new favorite duo is back, get it while it’s hot. 

Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter @SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/
